title: bootstrap fails, fresh build "found possibly newer version of crate `std` which `getopts` depends on"

labels.name: T-bootstrap
labels.description: Relevant to the bootstrap subteam: Rust's build system (x.py and src/bootstrap)

body:
repo @ e4c66afba5d69356879570aeff22db5a38566a86
````
rm -rf build
./x.py build
````

The error is reproducible after clearning `build` directory.
